document_data.name: Orcolla
document_data.mainbody: '''Orcolla''' was the [[duergar]] high priest of [[Orcus]] in [[Deepearth]] in the [[Underdark]] in the [[Barony of Bloodstone]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Orcolla had always at his side a [[marilith]].
document_data.History: In [[1357 DR]], Orcolla was on the verge of prepareingthe ceremony to summon the [[demon lord]] when [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s party and the [[deep gnome]]s attacked the temple. Orcolla died in the fighting.
